# Dragonmark Whip, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** S, Dr

**Range:** Personal

**Effect:** One 10-foot-long whip

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Dragonmarked (WotC), pg. 151

*Your dragonmark begins to writhe and uncoil, springing from your hand as a 20-foot-long whip of scintillating energy.*

As *[[Dragonmark Whip (Spell)|dragonmark whip]]*, except that the whip has a reach of 20 feet, deals up to 1d8+20 points of damage, and can be used to deliver touch spells of 7th level or lower.

*Dragonmark:* Any greater true or aberrant dragonmark, or any Siberys dragonmark.
